import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; interface LongStayTripProps { onNavigate?: (page: string) => void; } const LongStayTrip: React.FC = ({ onNavigate }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [destinationCategories, setDestinationCategories] = useState<{[key: string]: string[]}>({}); const [isLoadingCategories, setIsLoadingCategories] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const renderTabContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'overview': return (

); case 'geographical': return (

Geographical Coverage

Long Stay Trip Insurance provides comprehensive worldwide coverage, ensuring you're protected during your extended travels across all continents and destinations.

Worldwide All Countries

Complete global coverage including USA, Canada, Australia, Asia, Africa, and all other continents.

Domestic and European

Special coverage for long-term stays in popular destinations like Australia, New Zealand, and Canada.

Worldwide Area 1

Enhanced coverage for working holiday visa holders and study abroad programs.

); case 'policy': return (

Policy Wording

Please review the detailed policy wording to understand the terms, conditions, and exclusions of your Long Stay Trip Insurance coverage.

Important Policy Information

Coverage Limits

Medical expenses: €10,000,000 | Personal liability: €5,000,000 | Business equipment: €5,000

Trip Duration

Maximum 15 months per trip, with options for extension

Special Benefits

Study materials, business equipment, temporary accommodation, emergency evacuation

Exclusions

Pre-existing medical conditions, extreme sports (unless specified), war zones

Claims Process

Contact our 24/7 helpline immediately in case of emergency or claim

); default: return null; } }; return (
